item.title: Asymptotic Error Analysis of Multilevel Stochastic Approximations for the Value-at-Risk and Expected Shortfall
item.description: arXiv:2311.15333v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: Cr\'epey, Frikha, and Louzi (2023) introduced a nested stochastic approximation algorithm and its multilevel acceleration to compute the value-at-risk and expected shortfall of a random financial loss. We hereby establish central limit theorems for the renormalized estimation errors associated with both algorithms as well as their averaged versions. Our findings are substantiated through a numerical example.
item.dc:creator: St\'ephane Cr\'epey, Noufel Frikha, Azar Louzi, Gilles Pag\`es
